20.title: Episode #3.20
20.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Each episode features 2 profiles and is jam packed with insider artist information, music videos and intimate interviews from some of the top names in music today like you've never seen before. Starring Common, Usher, Nicki Minaj, Snoop Dogg, Trey Songz, 50 Cent, Mary J. Blige, Neyo, Busta Rhymes, Bruno Mars, Nas, Ludacris, Keyshia Cole, Earth Wind & Fire, Robin Thicke and More!
